greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Inverse permutation to A257503.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10440
Index entries for sequences related to factorial base representation
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
program: (Scheme) (define (A257504 n) (let ((col (A257681 n)) (row (A257679 n))) (* (/ 1 2) (- (expt (+ row col) 2) row col col col -2))))
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 06 2015
